title: july 7: the best thing since sliced bread (with Jelani Aryeh)
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the invention of sliced bread. After, she’s joined by guest Jelani Aryeh. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
